CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper October 19, 1946, pg. 21, reads: "Jazz Jamboree - Art Pallan, ring leader of Station WWSW's Jazz Jamboree, popular disc jockey show aired every night from 11 P.M. until midnight, brought his paraphernalia to the Ammon Center for his stint on Monday night. The National Achievement Clubs were honored. Art is shown with a group of fans during the broadcast. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: WWSW radio station disc jockey Art Pallan surrounded by seven women wearing gowns, on stage in Ammon Center
